A type of adaptive synchronization technology for LCD displays. It helps displays eliminate screen tearing, stuttering
Connector has a maximum bandwidth of up to 80 Gbps, providing support for higher resolutions and refresh rates

If youre looking for a cheap GPU deal, now is the time to buy. After a nasty slip in gaming revenue from Nvidia, prices from both AMD and Nvidia are starting to tumble even below the list price.  GPU prices have largely returned to normal, despite a few key graphics cards selling for above list price. Graphics cards are in stock at retailers, which has cut off scalpers at the knees with inflated prices.

- Digital Trends November 2022
